message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $15,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $10,500? This still leaves a good margin for you, and it's closer to my initial offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,800, but that's as high as I can go. I really need to save as much as possible on this purchase.
